step1: Download our mobile agent throw Testflight (IOS) or with the APK (Android) asking for it to our team
step2: Create a security PIN. If you count with biometric authentications they will be added automatically.
step3: Create your DID (Descentralized ID) to be able to interact with all the identity process.
step4: Generate a Verifiable Credential with the right side form.
